edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.pedersen

Class CmtPedersenWithProofsReceiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.pedersen.CmtPedersenReceiverCore
      • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.pedersen.CmtPedersenReceiver
        • edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.commitmentScheme.pedersen.CmtPedersenWithProofsReceiver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CmtOnBigInteger, CmtReceiver, CmtWithProofsReceiver, CommitSecLevel, PerfectlyHidingCmt, SecureCommit, SecurityLevel, StatisticallyHidingCmt

    public class CmtPedersenWithProofsReceiver
extends CmtPedersenReceiver
implements CmtWithProofsReceiver
    Concrete implementation of receiver with proofs. This implementation uses ZK based on SigmaPedersenKnowledge and SIgmaPedersenCommittedValue.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CmtPedersenWithProofsReceiver(Channel channel)
      Default constructor that gets the channel and creates the ZK verifiers with default Dlog group.
      CmtPedersenWithProofsReceiver(Channel channel, DlogGroup dlog, int t, java.security.SecureRandom random)
      Constructor that gets the channel, dlog, statistical parameter and random and uses them to create the ZK provers.

      boolean verifyKnowledge(long id)

        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if there was a problem in the serialization.

      • CmtPedersenWithProofsReceiver

        Parameters:
        channel -
        dlog -
        t - statistical parameter
        random -
        Throws:
        SecurityLevelException - if the given dlog is not DDH secure
        InvalidDlogGroupException - if the given dlog is not valid.
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if there was a problem in the serialization
        java.io.IOException - if there was a problem in the communication
        CheatAttemptException - if the receiver h is not in the DlogGroup.
